name: my3D 360° SHARKS
description:
MY3D APPS CAN ONLY BE VIEWED WITH THE MY3D VIEWER. VISIT MY3DNOW.COM TO PURCHASE.

If you own an iPhone 4 or iPod touch 4, you can explore and hunt the living ocean through the eyes of a shark! my3D 360° Sharks immerses you in an underwater shark adventure.

Choose your shark and then roam underwater, exploring and hunting for new species of prey.

As you explore, search for treasure, shipwrecks and other surprises, and learn about the species around you.

You can even break the surface to see the upper world.

With six unique environments, there is always a new adventure around the next reef.

If you own an iPhone 3G or 3Gs or iPod touch 3G, your my3D underwater adventure includes exploring a shipwreck and a dive in a shark cage! It’s a 360 degree 3D expedition to the bottom of the sea.

COMPATIBLE WITH: iPhone 3G, 3GS, 4G; iPod touch 3G, 4G
